cpcloud opened a new pull request #10953:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/10953


   This PR replaces most of the use of hardcoded paths
   to things `#!/bin` and `#!/usr/bin`, so most of the tools
   in `dev` and a bunch of the C++ development tools are usable
   on systems that don't have bash at this location.

fields.description:
Not all linuxen have {{bash}} at {{/bin/bash}}. Systems that support {{#!/bin/bash}} support {{#!/usr/bin/env bash}}. The {{env}} variant will take the first available bash interpreter as opposed to a hardcoded location.

Hopefully this is relatively uncontroversial.
